projects.recipesBackendDescription: Backend implementation for a recipe platform where you can organize your weekly diets.
projects.recipesFrontendDescription: Frontend development for a recipe page. We present recipes in an attractive and easy-to-follow manner, so the user doesn't waste much time choosing recipes.
projects.ipTrackerDescription: This project involves the creation of an interactive user interface that allows tracking the location of an IP address.
projects.eCommerceDescription: Building a section of an e-commerce platform where users can view different product photos and add or remove products from the shopping cart.
projects.rockPaperTitle: Rock, Paper, Scissors: FrontendMentor Advanced Challenge.
projects.rockPaperDescription: Interactive rock-paper-scissors game that you can play against the CPU.
projects.RatingComponentDescription: Submit the score of a satisfaction questionnaire.
projects.TipCalculatorDescription: Calculate the tip based on the number of people
projects.NotificationsPageDescription: Simulation of the view of a notifications page.
